<title level="1" pfs="">[Jesseri The Hailstorm](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1828)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Jesseri The Hailstorm](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1828)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 52</row>

**Perception** +23

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Mammoth Lord Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +23, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +23, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +21, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
_[moderate healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186)_, _+1 [hide](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_, _+1 [staff of divination](/Equipment.aspx?ID=353)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 29 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 150

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_staff_ +19 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Primal Spontaneous Spells** DC 29, attack +21
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Air Bubble](/Spells.aspx?ID=5), [Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Endure Elements](/Spells.aspx?ID=99), [Water Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=371) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=367) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=155), [Ice Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=695) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) (3 slots)

**Rituals** 

- **3rd**
[Reincarnate](/Rituals.aspx?ID=35)
- **5th**
[Summerland Spell](/Rituals.aspx?ID=76)

**Child of Winter**   When Jesseri Casts a Spell that deals damage and doesn't have a duration, she deals additional cold damage that's equal to the spell's level and ignores cold resistance 10.

**Signature Spells**   Jesseri can heighten [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) and [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) to any level for which she has an available spell slot.

</column>
name: Jesseri The Hailstorm
